mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaolian_id as jiaolianId ,a.cheliang_uuid_number as cheliangUuidNumber ,a.cheliang_name as cheliangName ,a.cheliang_types as cheliangTypes ,a.cheliang_content as cheliangContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaolian.jiaolian_name as jiaolianName ,jiaolian.jiaolian_phone as jiaolianPhone ,jiaolian.jiaolian_id_number as jiaolianIdNumber ,jiaolian.jiaolian_photo as jiaolianPhoto ,jiaolian.jiaolian_email as jiaolianEmail
FROM cheliang a left JOIN jiaolian jiaolian ON a.jiaolian_id = jiaolian.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaolian_id = #{params.jiaolianId} )
and a.cheliang_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangUuidNumber},'%')
and a.cheliang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangName},'%')
and a.cheliang_types = #{params.cheliangTypes}
and a.cheliang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiaolian_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaolian.jiaolian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianName},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianPhone},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianIdNumber},'%')
and jiaolian.jiaolian_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaolianEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
